SEARCH
Package Products

Class Product

java.lang.Object
Products.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonIdentifiable
public class Product extends Object implements JsonIdentifiable
The Product class represents a product in a retail system. It implements the JsonIdentifiable interface.

      name - The name of the product.
      price - The price of the product.
      description - The description of the product.
      id - The ID of the product.
      offer - The offer applied to the product.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the product.
      Returns:
      The name of the product.

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the product.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name of the product.

    • getPrice

      public double getPrice()
      Retrieves the price of the product. If a discount is applied, it retrieves the discounted price.
      Returns:
      The price or discounted price of the product.

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(double price)
      Sets the price of the product.
      Parameters:
      price - The new price of the product.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Retrieves the description of the product.
      Returns:
      The description of the product.

      public void setDescription(String description)
      Sets the description of the product.
      Parameters:
      description - The new description of the product.

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Retrieves the ID of the product.
      Returns:
      The ID of the product.

      public void setId(String id)
      Sets the ID of the product.
      Parameters:
      id - The new ID of the product.

    • getOffer

      public Offers getOffer()
      Retrieves the offer applied to the product.
      Returns:
      The offer applied to the product.

    • setOffer

      public void setOffer(Offers offer)
      Sets the offer applied to the product and updates the discounted price.
      Parameters:
      offer - The new offer to be applied to the product.

    • removeOffer

      public void removeOffer()
      Removes the offer applied to the product and resets the discounted price.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides the default `toString()` method to provide a human-readable representation of the product.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representation of the product, including the name, price, discount price (if any), offer (if any), description, and ID.

    • getJsonId

      public String getJsonId()
      Overrides the `getJsonId()` method to generate a JSON-compatible ID for the product.
      Specified by:
      getJsonId in interface JsonIdentifiable
      Returns:
      The JSON-compatible ID for the product, which is the name and ID of the product separated by an underscore.
